channel.title: Kill Points in shop
channel.description: Im useing Demise PK source and theres a special shop were u need like 250 kills to wear/buy the items but if u buy it, u dont lose any kills any1 can tell me howto make u able to wear on 0 kills and make u lose Kills to buy?
